name: @noble/secp256k1
description: Fastest 4KB JS implementation of secp256k1 ECDH & ECDSA signatures compliant with RFC6979

scripts.build:min: cd test/build; npm install; npm run terser
scripts.build:release: npm run --silent build:min > test/build/noble-secp256k1.min.js; npm run --silent build:mingz > test/build/noble-secp256k1.min.js.gz
scripts.loc: echo "`npm run --silent build:min | wc -c` symbols `wc -l < index.ts` LOC, `npm run --silent build:mingz | wc -c`B gzipped"

author: Paul Miller (https://paulmillr.com)
